verses.verse: וַיַּ֧עַל <WH5927> came up מַלְאַךְ־ <WH4397> And an angel יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> of the LORD מִן־ <WH4480> from הַגִּלְגָּ֖ל <WH1537> from Gilgal אֶל־ <WH413> to הַבֹּכִ֑ים <WH1066> to Bochim פ וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> and said אַעֲלֶ֨ה <WH5927> I made you to go up אֶתְכֶ֜ם <WH853> מִמִּצְרַ֗יִם <WH4714> out of Egypt וָאָבִ֤יא <WH935> and have brought אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> into הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> you unto the land אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which נִשְׁבַּ֙עְתִּי֙ <WH7650> which I sware לַאֲבֹ֣תֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1> unto your fathers וָאֹמַ֕ר <WH559> and I said לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not אָפֵ֧ר <WH6565> break בְּרִיתִ֛י <WH1285> my covenant אִתְּכֶ֖ם <WH854> for לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> I will never

וְאַתֶּ֗ם <WH859> you לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no תִכְרְת֤וּ <WH3772> And ye shall make בְרִית֙ <WH1285> no league לְיֽוֹשְׁבֵי֙ <WH3427> with the inhabitants הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> of this land הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise מִזְבְּחוֹתֵיהֶ֖ם <WH4196> their altars תִּתֹּצ֑וּן <WH5422> ye shall throw down וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> no שְׁמַעְתֶּ֥ם <WH8085> but ye have not obeyed בְּקֹלִ֖י <WH6963> my voice מַה־ <WH4100> what זֹּ֥את <WH2063> have ye עֲשִׂיתֶֽם׃ <WH6213> why have ye done

וְגַ֣ם <WH1571> also אָמַ֔רְתִּי <WH559> Wherefore I also said לֹֽא־ <WH3808> I will not אֲגָרֵ֥שׁ <WH1644> I will not drive them out אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> מִפְּנֵיכֶ֑ם <WH6440> from before וְהָי֤וּ <WH1961> will become לָכֶם֙ לְצִדִּ֔ים <WH6654> you but they shall be [as thorns] in your sides וֵאלֹ֣הֵיהֶ֔ם <WH430> and their gods יִהְי֥וּ <WH1961> will become לָכֶ֖ם לְמוֹקֵֽשׁ׃ <WH4170> shall be a snare

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> become כְּדַבֵּ֞ר <WH1696> spake מַלְאַ֤ךְ <WH4397> And it came to pass when the angel יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> these words הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these אֶֽל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> unto all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיִּשְׂא֥וּ <WH5375> lifted up הָעָ֛ם <WH5971> that the people אֶת־ <WH853> קוֹלָ֖ם <WH6963> their voice וַיִּבְכּֽוּ׃ <WH1058> and wept

וַֽיִּקְרְא֛וּ <WH7121> And they called שֵֽׁם־ <WH8034> the name הַמָּק֥וֹם <WH4725> of that place הַה֖וּא <WH1931> he בֹּכִ֑ים <WH1066> Bochim וַיִּזְבְּחוּ־ <WH2076> and they sacrificed שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> and there לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> there unto the LORD פ

וַיְשַׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> go יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> And when Joshua אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֑ם <WH5971> had let the people וַיֵּלְכ֧וּ <WH1980> went בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every man לְנַחֲלָת֖וֹ <WH5159> unto his inheritance לָרֶ֥שֶׁת <WH3423> to possess אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the land

וַיַּעַבְד֤וּ <WH5647> served הָעָם֙ <WH5971> And the people אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> all the days יְהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <WH3091> of Joshua וְכֹ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> and all יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> and all the days הַזְּקֵנִ֗ים <WH2205> of the elders אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who הֶאֱרִ֤יכוּ <WH748> defer יָמִים֙ <WH3117> the days אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after that יְהוֹשׁ֔וּעַ <WH3091> Joshua אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who רָא֗וּ <WH7200> who had seen אֵ֣ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all מַעֲשֵׂ֤ה <WH4639> works יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD הַגָּד֔וֹל <WH1419> all the great אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> that he did לְיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> for Israel

וַיָּ֛מָת <WH4191> died יְהוֹשֻׁ֥עַ <WH3091> And Joshua בִּן־ <WH1121> the son נ֖וּן <WH5126> of Nun עֶ֣בֶד <WH5650> the servant יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD בֶּן־ <WH1121> old מֵאָ֥ה <WH3967> [being] an hundred וָעֶ֖שֶׂר <WH6235> and ten שָׁנִֽים׃ <WH8141> years

וַיִּקְבְּר֤וּ <WH6912> And they buried אוֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> בִּגְב֣וּל <WH1366> him in the border נַחֲלָת֔וֹ <WH5159> of his inheritance בְּתִמְנַת־ חֶ֖רֶס <WH8556> in Timnathheres בְּהַ֣ר <WH2022> in the mount אֶפְרָ֑יִם <WH669> of Ephraim מִצְּפ֖וֹן <WH6828> on the north side לְהַר־ <WH2022> of the hill גָּֽעַשׁ׃ <WH1608> Gaash

וְגַם֙ <WH1571> also כָּל־ <WH3605> All הַדּ֣וֹר <WH1755> And also all that generation הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he נֶאֶסְפ֖וּ <WH622> were gathered אֶל־ <WH413> to אֲבוֹתָ֑יו <WH1> unto their fathers וַיָּקָם֩ <WH6965> and there arose דּ֨וֹר <WH1755> generation אַחֵ֜ר <WH312> another אַחֲרֵיהֶ֗ם <WH310> after אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who לֹא־ <WH3808> did not יָֽדְעוּ֙ <WH3045> them which knew אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> not the LORD וְגַם֙ <WH1571> nor אֶת־ <WH853> הַֽמַּעֲשֶׂ֔ה <WH4639> nor yet the works אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> which he had done לְיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> for Israel ס

וַיַּעֲשׂ֧וּ <WH6213> did בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶת־ <WH853> הָרַ֖ע <WH7451> evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיַּעַבְד֖וּ <WH5647> and served אֶת־ <WH853> הַבְּעָלִֽים׃ <WH1168> Baalim

וַיַּעַזְב֞וּ <WH5800> And they forsook אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> God אֲבוֹתָ֗ם <WH1> of their fathers הַמּוֹצִ֣יא <WH3318> which brought them out אוֹתָם֮ <WH853> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> of the land מִצְרַיִם֒ <WH4714> of Egypt וַיֵּלְכ֞וּ <WH1980> along אַחֲרֵ֣י ׀ <WH310> after that אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֗ים <WH312> other מֵאֱלֹהֵ֤י <WH430> of the gods הָֽעַמִּים֙ <WH5971> of the people אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> who סְבִיב֣וֹתֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5439> that [were] round about וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲו֖וּ <WH7812> them and bowed לָהֶ֑ם וַיַּכְעִ֖סוּ <WH3707> to anger אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> themselves unto them and provoked the LORD
וַיַּעַזְב֖וּ <WH5800> And they forsook אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וַיַּעַבְד֥וּ <WH5647> and served לַבַּ֖עַל <WH1168> Baal וְלָעַשְׁתָּרֽוֹת׃ <WH6252> and Ashtaroth

וַיִּֽחַר־ <WH2734> was hot אַ֤ף <WH639> And the anger יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> against Israel וַֽיִּתְּנֵם֙ <WH5414> and he delivered בְּיַד־ <WH3027> them into the hands שֹׁסִ֔ים <WH8154> of spoilers וַיָּשֹׁ֖סּוּ <WH8155> that spoiled אוֹתָ֑ם <WH853> וַֽיִּמְכְּרֵ֞ם <WH4376> them and he sold בְּיַ֤ד <WH3027> them into the hands אֽוֹיְבֵיהֶם֙ <WH341> of their enemies מִסָּבִ֔יב <WH5439> round about וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> no יָכְל֣וּ <WH3201> so that they could ע֔וֹד <WH5750> not any longer לַעֲמֹ֖ד <WH5975> stand לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before אוֹיְבֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH341> their enemies

בְּכֹ֣ל ׀ <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> they יָצְא֗וּ <WH3318> Whithersoever they went out יַד־ <WH3027> the hand יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD הָיְתָה־ <WH1961> become בָּ֣ם לְרָעָ֔ה <WH7451> was against them for evil כַּֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> had said יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> as the LORD וְכַאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after נִשְׁבַּ֥ע <WH7650> had sworn יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> and as the LORD לָהֶ֑ם וַיֵּ֥צֶר <WH3334> distressed לָהֶ֖ם מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> unto them and they were greatly

וַיָּ֥קֶם <WH6965> raised up יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Nevertheless the LORD שֹֽׁפְטִ֑ים <WH8199> judges וַיּ֣וֹשִׁיע֔וּם <WH3467> which delivered מִיַּ֖ד <WH3027> them out of the hand שֹׁסֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH8154> of those that spoiled

וְגַ֤ם <WH1571> Yet אֶל־ <WH413> to שֹֽׁפְטֵיהֶם֙ <WH8199> unto their judges לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not שָׁמֵ֔עוּ <WH8085> And yet they would not hearken כִּ֣י <WH3588> for זָנ֗וּ <WH2181> but they went a whoring אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> after אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <WH312> other וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲו֖וּ <WH7812> and bowed לָהֶ֑ם סָ֣רוּ <WH5493> themselves unto them they turned מַהֵ֗ר <WH4118> quickly מִן־ <WH4480> from הַדֶּ֜רֶךְ <WH1870> out of the way אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which הָלְכ֧וּ <WH1980> walked in אֲבוֹתָ֛ם <WH1> which their fathers לִשְׁמֹ֥עַ <WH8085> obeying מִצְוֹת־ <WH4687> the commandments יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD לֹא־ <WH3808> not עָ֥שׂוּ <WH6213> [but] they did כֵֽן׃ <WH3651> after that

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> When הֵקִ֨ים <WH6965> raised יְהוָ֥ה ׀ <WH3068> And when the LORD לָהֶם֮ שֹֽׁפְטִים֒ <WH8199> them up judges וְהָיָ֤ה <WH1961> become יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> then the LORD עִם־ <WH5973> was with הַשֹּׁפֵ֔ט <WH8199> was with the judge וְהֽוֹשִׁיעָם֙ <WH3467> and delivered מִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> them out of the hand אֹֽיְבֵיהֶ֔ם <WH341> of their enemies כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> all the days הַשּׁוֹפֵ֑ט <WH8199> of the judge כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When יִנָּחֵ֤ם <WH5162> for it repented יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD מִנַּֽאֲקָתָ֔ם <WH5009> of their groanings מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> because לֹחֲצֵיהֶ֖ם <WH3905> by reason of them that oppressed וְדֹחֲקֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH1766> them and vexed

וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <WH1961> came בְּמ֣וֹת <WH4191> crying הַשּׁוֹפֵ֗ט <WH8199> And it came to pass when the judge יָשֻׁ֙בוּ֙ <WH7725> [that] they returned וְהִשְׁחִ֣יתוּ <WH7843> and corrupted מֵֽאֲבוֹתָ֔ם <WH1> [themselves] more than their fathers לָלֶ֗כֶת <WH1980> along אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> after that אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <WH312> other לְעָבְדָ֖ם <WH5647> to serve וּלְהִשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֣ת <WH7812> them and to bow down לָהֶ֑ם לֹ֤א <WH3808> did not הִפִּ֙ילוּ֙ <WH5307> unto them they ceased מִמַּ֣עַלְלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH4611> not from their own doings וּמִדַּרְכָּ֖ם <WH1870> way הַקָּשָֽׁה׃ <WH7186> nor from their stubborn

וַיִּֽחַר־ <WH2734> was hot אַ֥ף <WH639> And the anger יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> against Israel וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> and he said יַעַן֩ <WH3282> because אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which עָבְר֜וּ <WH5674> hath transgressed הַגּ֣וֹי <WH1471> Because that this people הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> this אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִיתִי֙ <WH1285> my covenant אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which צִוִּ֣יתִי <WH6680> which I commanded אֶת־ <WH853> אֲבוֹתָ֔ם <WH1> their fathers וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not שָׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> and have not hearkened לְקוֹלִֽי׃ <WH6963> unto my voice

גַּם־ <WH1571> also אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I לֹ֣א <WH3808> will no אוֹסִ֔יף <WH3254> I also will not henceforth לְהוֹרִ֥ישׁ <WH3423> drive out אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> any מִפְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6440> from before מִן־ <WH4480> at הַגּוֹיִ֛ם <WH1471> them of the nations אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which עָזַ֥ב <WH5800> left יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> which Joshua וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <WH4191> when he died

לְמַ֛עַן <WH4616> order נַסּ֥וֹת <WH5254> That through them I may prove בָּ֖ם אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel הֲשֹׁמְרִ֣ים <WH8104> whether they will keep הֵם֩ <WH1992> like אֶת־ <WH853> דֶּ֨רֶךְ <WH1870> the way יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> of the LORD לָלֶ֣כֶת <WH1980> to walk בָּ֗ם כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after שָׁמְר֥וּ <WH8104> did keep אֲבוֹתָ֖ם <WH1> therein as their fathers אִם־ <WH518> or לֹֽא׃ <WH3808> not

וַיַּנַּ֤ח <WH3240> left יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Therefore the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> הַגּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> those nations הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> those לְבִלְתִּ֥י <WH1115> without הוֹרִישָׁ֖ם <WH3423> driving them out מַהֵ֑ר <WH4118> hastily וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> did not נְתָנָ֖ם <WH5414> neither delivered בְּיַד־ <WH3027> he them into the hand יְהוֹשֻֽׁעַ׃ <WH3091> of Joshua פ
